477282bb-aff1-44cd-bab3-280bd4ee1a99.description: One of the main goals in Up to Us is to encourage students to sign the Up to Us Pledge in support of bipartisan solutions to the national debt. The awardees of this badge demonstrate a true commitment to action, as all Up to Us Pledges are delivered to the signer's local legislator. Out of 100 teams nationwide, the Top Pledge Earner badge is awarded to members of the top three teams with the most pledge signatures as a percentage of their total student body.

Brainstormed orginal and creative campaign activities to engage students
Attended multiple campaign activities to further the conversation about the national debt
Aided Team Leader with delegated campaign tasks
Supported Team Leader in submitting campaign documents

df1f771f-d08b-434e-ba02-2ad288768e86.description: One of Up to Us' main goals is to encourage students to sign the Up to Us Pledge in support of bipartisan solutions to the national debt. The awardees of this badge demonstrate a true commitment to action, as all Up to Us Pledges are delivered to the signer's local legislator. Out of 140 teams nationwide, this individual and their team were one of the top three pledge signature collectors.
df1f771f-d08b-434e-ba02-2ad288768e86.name: Top Pledge Earner

badge_template_activities.title: Facilitated outreach to hundreds of students on their campus through effective social media promotion and expertly executed campus events.
Aid team in collecting Up to Us Pledges throughout the campus competition.

cc2d950c-cab9-4b04-9f6d-1f65b258484a.description: Out of more than 50 teams nationwide, this badge-earner and their team were one of the top three pledge signature collectors. As a member of this team, this badge-earner facilitated successful outreach to hundreds of students on their campus through effective social media promotion and expertly executed online and on-campus events.
cc2d950c-cab9-4b04-9f6d-1f65b258484a.name: Top Pledge Earner (Y9 copy)

badge_template_activities.title: One of the top three pledge earners from over 50 teams nationwide
Collected hundreds of pledge signatures from students on campus
